creator: prakash.sivakumar@wipro.com
text:
when we use maven build script with the eclipse plugin like
"mvn clean compile install eclipse:eclipse"

Generates the following eclipse configuration files: 
.project and .classpath files 
.setting/org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs with project specific compiler settings 
.various configuration files for WTP (Web Tools Project), if the parameter wtpversion is set to a valid version (WTP configuration is not generated by default) 

is there any option available for ant.apache, if so please help me out how to bring those file when taking build of a project which doesn't have those.

as these files will not be checked-in to the respository we need to auto generate those files, so that it will be treated as a java project.

please use the user mailing list for questions, not the issue tracker

The following two URLs are the first two hits of a Google search for "ant eclipse .project"

http://eclipse.sys-con.com/node/100814
http://ant-eclipse.sourceforge.net/
creator: bodewig@apache.org
